meta.name: Dialectical Scaffold
meta.description: Map polarity, hold both poles, invite synthesis without premature collapse.

procedure.title: Name the Poles
procedure.instruction: Identify the two poles of the polarity they're experiencing (e.g., freedom/structure, action/rest, self/other).

procedure.title: Honor Both
procedure.instruction: Name the wisdom in EACH pole. What does each one offer? What would be lost without it?

procedure.title: Invite the Third
procedure.instruction: Ask: What emerges when you hold both without collapsing into either? Don't synthesize FOR them - invite them to sense it.
